name: Mai Tai
description: Transport yourself to the tropical shores of Polynesia with the Mai Tai, a legendary tiki cocktail that first emerged in the 1940s. Crafted with a harmonious blend of rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, orange cura√ßao, and a hint of grenadine, the Mai Tai embodies the essence of island paradise. Served over crushed ice and garnished with a vibrant mint sprig and a slice of pineapple, this exotic libation is a delightful balance of sweet, sour, and fruity flavors, capturing the spirit of a vacation in every sip.
instructions: Shake all ingredients besides the dark rum together over ice.
Add ice to serving glass and strain mix over. Float dark rum on top.
Garnish with pineapple wedge, mint sprig and cherry.
